title: [Client] [macOS] Client stuck on "Authenticating..."
body:
When logging onto the client, I'm stuck on the launch screen with a loading spinner and a message that says "Authenticating...". If I shut down the client and restart it, the app doesn't load.

I'm on macOS Sierra, version 10.12.4, with Frontier as my ISP

replies.body:
Update: I tried logging in from my phone's internet instead, it worked.

Seems like could be Frontier related .
I also have Frontier internet. Thanks for the info, this might be a better lead. I'll update the OP as well.
